property.name: name
property.shortdesc: The name of the Row.

property.name: index
property.shortdesc: The index of the Row within its containing object.

property.name: rowSpan
property.shortdesc: The number of rows that the object spans.

property.name: columnSpan
property.shortdesc: The number of columns that the object spans.

property.name: overflows
property.shortdesc: If true, the story has overset text.

property.name: parentRow
property.shortdesc: The parent row of the cell.

property.name: parentColumn
property.shortdesc: The parent column of the cell.

property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the Row (a Table).

property.name: cells
property.shortdesc: A collection of table cells.

property.name: rows
property.shortdesc: A collection of table rows.

property.name: columns
property.shortdesc: A collection of table columns.

property.name: events
property.shortdesc: A collection of events.

property.name: eventListeners
property.shortdesc: A collection of event listeners.

property.name: height
property.shortdesc: The height of the Row. For a table or column, specifies the sum of the row heights.

property.name: width
property.shortdesc: The width of the Row. For a table or row, specifies the sum of the column widths.

property.name: contents
property.shortdesc: The text contents. For rows or columns, when specified as a string, the sting populates each cell in the row or column; when specified as an array, the first value in the array populates the left-most cell in the row or the top-most cell in the column; the next value populates the next cell to the right (for rows) or the next lowest cell (for columns), and so on. Can return: String, SpecialCharacters enumerator or Array of Strings or SpecialCharacters enumerators. Can also accept: NothingEnum enumerator or Array of Strings, SpecialCharacters enumerators or NothingEnum enumerators.

property.name: gradientFillLength
property.shortdesc: The length (of a linear gradient) or radius (of a radial gradient) applied to the fill of the object.

property.name: gradientFillAngle
property.shortdesc: The angle of a linear gradient applied to the fill of the object. (Range: -180 to 180)

property.name: gradientFillStart
property.shortdesc: The starting point (in page coordinates) of a gradient applied to the fill of the Row, in the format [x, y].

property.name: topInset
property.shortdesc: The top inset of the cell.

property.name: leftInset
property.shortdesc: The left inset of the cell.

property.name: bottomInset
property.shortdesc: The bottom inset of the cell.

property.name: rightInset
property.shortdesc: The right inset of the cell.

property.name: fillColor
property.shortdesc: The swatch (color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the fill of the object. Can also accept: String.

property.name: fillTint
property.shortdesc: The tint (as a percentage) of the fill of the object.

property.name: overprintFill
property.shortdesc: If true, the fill of the object will overprint.

property.name: topLeftDiagonalLine
property.shortdesc: If true, draws a diagonal line starting from the top left.

property.name: topRightDiagonalLine
property.shortdesc: If true, draws a diagonal line starting from the top right.

property.name: diagonalLineInFront
property.shortdesc: If true, draws the diagonal line in front of cell contents.

property.name: diagonalLineStrokeWeight
property.shortdesc: The diagonal line stroke weight.

property.name: diagonalLineStrokeType
property.shortdesc: The stroke type of the diagonal line(s). Can also accept: String.

property.name: diagonalLineStrokeColor
property.shortdesc: The diagonal line color, specified as a swatch.

property.name: diagonalLineStrokeTint
property.shortdesc: The diagonal line tint (as a percentage). (Range: 0 to 100)

property.name: diagonalLineStrokeOverprint
property.shortdesc: If true, the diagonal line stroke will overprint.

property.name: diagonalLineStrokeGapColor
property.shortdesc: The swatch (color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the gap of the diagonal line stroke. Note: Not valid when diagonal line stroke type is solid.

property.name: diagonalLineStrokeGapTint
property.shortdesc: The tint (as a percentage) of the diagonal line stroke gap color. Note: Not valid when diagonal line stroke type is solid.

property.name: diagonalLineStrokeGapOverprint
property.shortdesc: If true, the stroke gap of the diagonal line will overprint. Note: Not valid when diagonal line stroke type is solid.

property.name: clipContentToCell
property.shortdesc: If true, clips the cell's content to width and height of the cell.

property.name: firstBaselineOffset
property.shortdesc: The distance between the baseline of the text and the top inset of the cell.

property.name: verticalJustification
property.shortdesc: The vertical alignment of cell.

property.name: paragraphSpacingLimit
property.shortdesc: The maximum space that can be added between paragraphs in a cell. Note: Valid only when vertical justification is justified.

property.name: minimumFirstBaselineOffset
property.shortdesc: The space between the baseline of the text and the top inset of the frame or cell.

property.name: rotationAngle
property.shortdesc: The rotation angle (in degrees) of the cell, specified as one of the following values: 0, 90, 180, or 270.

property.name: leftEdgeStrokeWeight
property.shortdesc: The stroke weight of the left edge border stroke.

property.name: leftEdgeStrokeType
property.shortdesc: The stroke type of the left edge. Can also accept: String.

property.name: leftEdgeStrokeColor
property.shortdesc: The swatch (color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the left edge border stroke.

property.name: leftEdgeStrokeTint
property.shortdesc: The tint (as a percentage) of the left edge border stroke. (Range: 0 to 100)

property.name: leftEdgeStrokeOverprint
property.shortdesc: If true, the left edge border stroke will overprint.

property.name: leftEdgeStrokeGapColor
property.shortdesc: The swatch (color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the gap of the left edge border stroke. Note: Not valid when left edge stroke type is solid.

property.name: leftEdgeStrokeGapTint
property.shortdesc: The tint (as a percentage) of the left edge border stroke gap color. (Range: 0 to 100) Note: Not valid when left edge stroke type is solid.

property.name: leftEdgeStrokeGapOverprint
property.shortdesc: If true, the gap color of the left edge border stroke will overprint. Note: Not valid when left edge stroke type is solid.

property.name: topEdgeStrokeWeight
property.shortdesc: The stroke weight of the top edge border stroke.

property.name: topEdgeStrokeType
property.shortdesc: The stroke type of the top edge. Can also accept: String.

property.name: topEdgeStrokeColor
property.shortdesc: The swatch (color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the top edge border stroke.

property.name: topEdgeStrokeTint
property.shortdesc: The tint (as a percentage) of the top edge border stroke. (Range: 0 to 100)

property.name: topEdgeStrokeOverprint
property.shortdesc: If true, the top edge border stroke will overprint.

property.name: topEdgeStrokeGapColor
property.shortdesc: The swatch (color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the gap of the top edge border stroke. Note: Not valid when top edge stroke type is solid.

property.name: topEdgeStrokeGapTint
property.shortdesc: The tint (as a percentage) of the top edge border stroke gap color. (Range: 0 to 100) Note: Not valid when top edge stroke type is solid.

property.name: topEdgeStrokeGapOverprint
property.shortdesc: If true, the gap color of the top edge border stroke will overprint. Note: Not valid when top edge stroke type is solid.

property.name: rightEdgeStrokeWeight
property.shortdesc: The stroke weight of the right edge border stroke.

property.name: rightEdgeStrokeType
property.shortdesc: The stroke type of the right edge. Can also accept: String.

property.name: rightEdgeStrokeColor
property.shortdesc: The color, specified as a swatch, of the right edge border stroke.

property.name: rightEdgeStrokeTint
property.shortdesc: The tint (as a percentage) of the right edge border stroke. (Range: 0 to 100)

property.name: rightEdgeStrokeOverprint
property.shortdesc: If true, the right edge border stroke will overprint.

property.name: rightEdgeStrokeGapColor
property.shortdesc: The swatch (color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the gap of the right edge border stroke. Note: Not valid when right edge stroke type is solid.

property.name: rightEdgeStrokeGapTint
property.shortdesc: The tint (as a percentage) of the right edge border stroke gap color. (Range: 0 to 100) Note: Not valid when right edge stroke type is solid.

property.name: rightEdgeStrokeGapOverprint
property.shortdesc: If true, the gap color of the right edge border stroke will overprint. Note: Not valid when right edge stroke type is solid.

property.name: bottomEdgeStrokeWeight
property.shortdesc: The stroke weight of the bottom edge border stroke.

property.name: bottomEdgeStrokeType
property.shortdesc: The stroke type of the bottom edge. Can also accept: String.

property.name: bottomEdgeStrokeColor
property.shortdesc: The swatch (color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the bottom edge border stroke.

property.name: bottomEdgeStrokeTint
property.shortdesc: The tint (as a percentage) of the bottom edge border stroke.

property.name: bottomEdgeStrokeOverprint
property.shortdesc: If true, the bottom edge border stroke will overprint.

property.name: bottomEdgeStrokeGapColor
property.shortdesc: The swatch (color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the gap of the bottom edge border stroke. Note: Not valid when bottom edge stroke type is solid.

property.name: bottomEdgeStrokeGapTint
property.shortdesc: The tint (as a percentage) of the bottom edge border stroke gap color. (Range: 0 to 100) Note: Not valid when bottom edge stroke type is solid.

property.name: bottomEdgeStrokeGapOverprint
property.shortdesc: If true, the gap color of the bottom edge border stroke will overprint. Note: Not valid when bottom edge stroke type is solid.

property.name: innerRowStrokeWeight
property.shortdesc: The stroke weight of the inner row border strokes.

property.name: innerRowStrokeType
property.shortdesc: The stroke type of the inner row. Can also accept: String.

property.name: innerRowStrokeColor
property.shortdesc: The color, specified as a swatch, of the inner row border stroke.

property.name: innerRowStrokeTint
property.shortdesc: The tint (as a percentage) of the inner row border stroke. (Range: 0 to 100)

property.name: innerRowStrokeOverprint
property.shortdesc: If true, the inner row border stroke will overprint.

property.name: innerRowStrokeGapColor
property.shortdesc: The swatch (color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the gap of the inner row border stroke. Note: Not valid when inner row stroke type is solid.

property.name: innerRowStrokeGapTint
property.shortdesc: The tint (as a percentage) of the inner row border stroke. (Range: 0 to 100) Note: Not valid when inner row stroke type is solid.

property.name: innerRowStrokeGapOverprint
property.shortdesc: If true, the gap color of the inner row border stroke will overprint. Note: Not valid when inner row stroke type is solid.

property.name: innerColumnStrokeWeight
property.shortdesc: The stroke weight of the inner column border stroke.

property.name: innerColumnStrokeType
property.shortdesc: The stroke type of the inner column. Can also accept: String.

property.name: innerColumnStrokeColor
property.shortdesc: The color, specified as a swatch, of the inner column border stroke.

property.name: innerColumnStrokeTint
property.shortdesc: The tint (as a percentage) of the inner column border stroke. (Range: 0 to 100)

property.name: innerColumnStrokeOverprint
property.shortdesc: If true, the inner column border stroke will overprint.

property.name: innerColumnStrokeGapColor
property.shortdesc: The swatch (color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the gap of the inner column border stroke. Note: Not valid when inner column stroke type is solid.

property.name: innerColumnStrokeGapTint
property.shortdesc: The tint (as a percentage) of the inner column border stroke gap color. (Range: 0 to 100) Note: Not valid when inner column stroke type is solid.

property.name: innerColumnStrokeGapOverprint
property.shortdesc: If true, the gap color of the inner column border stroke will overprint. Note: Not valid when inner column stroke type is solid.

property.name: minimumHeight
property.shortdesc: The minimum height of the cells in the Row. Note: When auto grow is true, cells can automatically grow larger than this amount when content is added. Also, the minimum height can affect redistribution.

property.name: maximumHeight
property.shortdesc: The maximum height to which cells in the Row may grow. Note: The maximum height cannot be exceeded even when auto grow is set to true. Also, the maximum height can affect redistribution.

property.name: keepWithNextRow
property.shortdesc: If true, keeps the row with the next row when the table is split across text frames or pages.

property.name: startRow
property.shortdesc: Indicates where to start the row.

property.name: autoGrow
property.shortdesc: If true, the height of the cell or the cells in the Row can increase or decrease automatically to fit cell content. Note: Allows cells to grow or shrink to the maximum or minimum height, if specified.

property.name: rowType
property.shortdesc: The row type.

property.name: writingDirection
property.shortdesc: The direction of the text in the cell.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: recompose
method.shortdesc: Recomposes the text in the Row.

method.name: findText
method.shortdesc: Finds text that matches the find what value.

parameters.name: reverseOrder
parameters.shortdesc: If true, returns the results in reverse order. (Optional)

method.name: changeText
method.shortdesc: Finds text that matches the find what value and replaces the text with the change to value.

parameters.name: reverseOrder
parameters.shortdesc: If true, returns the results in reverse order. (Optional)

method.name: findGrep
method.shortdesc: Finds text that matches the find what value.

parameters.name: reverseOrder
parameters.shortdesc: If true, returns the results in reverse order. (Optional)

method.name: changeGrep
method.shortdesc: Finds text that matches the find what value and replaces the text with the change to value.

parameters.name: reverseOrder
parameters.shortdesc: If true, returns the results in reverse order. (Optional)

method.name: findGlyph
method.shortdesc: Finds glyphs that match the find what value.

parameters.name: reverseOrder
parameters.shortdesc: If true, returns the results in reverse order. (Optional)

method.name: changeGlyph
method.shortdesc: Finds glyphs that match the find what value and replaces the glyphs with the change to value.

parameters.name: reverseOrder
parameters.shortdesc: If true, returns the results in reverse order. (Optional)

method.name: findTransliterate
method.shortdesc: Finds text that matches the find character type value.

parameters.name: reverseOrder
parameters.shortdesc: If true, returns the results in reverse order. (Optional)

method.name: changeTransliterate
method.shortdesc: Finds text that matches the find character type value and replaces the text with the change character type value.

parameters.name: reverseOrder
parameters.shortdesc: If true, returns the results in reverse order. (Optional)

method.name: remove
method.shortdesc: Deletes the Row.

method.name: merge
method.shortdesc: Merges the cells.

parameters.name: with
parameters.shortdesc: The cell(s) to merge with. Can accept: Cell, Row or Column. (Optional)

method.name: unmerge
method.shortdesc: Unmerges all merged cells in the Row.

method.name: split
method.shortdesc: Splits the cell along the specified axis.

parameters.name: using
parameters.shortdesc: The direction in which to split the cell.

method.name: redistribute
method.shortdesc: Redistributes the specified range of Rows so that the Rows have a uniform size. Note: The maximum or minimum height or width specified for some of the cells in the range may prevent them from being exactly even.

parameters.name: using
parameters.shortdesc: The direction in which to redistribute.

parameters.name: thru
parameters.shortdesc: The last Row in the range. Can accept: Cell, Column or Row. (Optional)

method.name: select
method.shortdesc: Selects the object.

parameters.name: existingSelection
parameters.shortdesc: The selection status of the Row in relation to previously selected objects. (Optional)

method.name: createOutlines
method.shortdesc: Converts text to outlines. Each line of text becomes a polygon object. When the converted text is a single letter that has no internal spaces or detached parts, the polygon contains only a single path. Note: To determine whether a font allows the creation of outlines, see allow outlines.

parameters.name: deleteOriginal
parameters.shortdesc: If true, deletes the original text. If false, creates the outlines as separate object(s) on top of the text.  (Optional)

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the Row.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

method.name: toSpecifier
method.shortdesc: Retrieves the object specifier.

method.name: addEventListener
method.shortdesc: Adds an event listener.

parameters.name: eventType
parameters.shortdesc: The event type.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameters.name: captures
parameters.shortdesc: This parameter is obsolete. (Optional)

method.name: removeEventListener
method.shortdesc: Removes the event listener.

parameters.name: eventType
parameters.shortdesc: The registered event type.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameters.name: captures
parameters.shortdesc: This parameter is obsolete. (Optional)
